name: DFT Outline Tracing
short_description: Detects the edges of an image and orders them into a path. It then emulates the compressed equivalent of the image by tracing the outline using epicycles, as if the outline was being traced by a mechanical arm.

name: Quadtree Compression
short_description: A program that compresses an image by dividing it into quadrants using a data structure called a 'quadtree'. It starts with a fully compressed image (represented as a single massive pixel) and 'decompresses' it one level at a time until a desired quality or a size limit is reached.

name: Boids Simulation
short_description: A flock behaviour simulation program that shows that through few simple rules complex emergent behaviours can be observed within groups. The rules for this simulation were derived by studying flocks or birds and schools of fish.

name: Maze Generator/Solver
short_description: A web-app written fully in HTML/CSS/JS to explore the properties of different maze generation and pathfinding algorithms.

name: Graphics Engine
short_description: An experiment to myself to see if I could build a simple graphics engine using only the operations of addition, subtraction, division, and multiplication. Built as a learning challenge to apply math courses that I took outside my degree, rather than a feature-rich engine.
